text: Q55. | Consider the relation schema R (A, B, C, D) with set of FDs {AB—C, BC—»D, A—>B}. Which FD has an extraneous attribute on the left hand side? (a) AB»C (b) BC—»D (c) Both (a) and (b) (d) None of the above Answer :-(a) Solution AB-C {A}*= {AB} contain extra attribute AB- C Contain B as extra attribute. Answer: (a)
